page.title: 17Family life in Coatbridge
page.content: The average number of children in a family in our school is 4. Most of the mums and dads work in Coatbridge. Some parents who work all day send their children to grandparents who look after them. Out of 73 children in our school 35 have videos. Spare time is spent watching videos, t.v.,or going walks. 20 families in our school have a car. Most families have tea about 5 o'clock. Most children go to bed between 8 o'clock and 10 o'clock and then the mums and dads watch t.v. or get a baby sitter and go out to a club. Some mums and dads play indoor bowls. Coatbridge has a very big indoor centre. The world bowling championships were held here this year.
